item.title: We are live.
item.description: For the past few months, I’ve been working on creating the Social Justice, Minus Dogma Online Course + Community. It’s a course (6 weeks, but you’re welcome to go at your own pace) + community (private forum online for discussing course materials, then forever-after hub for continued learning and support). You can read all about it on the SJMD Landing Page, and sign up and start learning with us right now, but I want to share a few key details I’m particularly excited about here as well:
